thread.title: 7 Plants That Can Boost Your Respiratory Health
thread.title_full: 7 Plants That Can Boost Your Respiratory Health

author: @onlymyhealth
title: 7 Plants That Can Boost Your Respiratory Health
text: 7 Plants That Can Boost Your Respiratory Health By Yashika Goel 19 Jul 2024, 11:47 IST Plants can aid and improve your lung health by improving air quality. It also absorbs harmful pollutants and bad odors. Tap to read seven plants that you can keep to improve your lung health. Alovera Alovera can give you a soothing effect on the lungs. It also has medicinal and herbal properties. It filters out the air around you. Snake plant Snake plant absorb airborne toxins and dust particles. It takes the carbon dioxide and converts it into oxygen at night. Flamingo lily Flamingo lily filters out harmful chemicals like ammonia, benzene, and xylene (air pollutants). It can grow with little to no sunlight. Spider plant Spider plants improve lung health by producing chlorophyll, which helps to provide better oxygen. It is a low-maintenance plant and reduces dust. Peace lily Peace lilies are a beautiful option for your home. They have a calming effect and enhance air quality by removing harmful toxins. Rubber plant Rubber plant help aid asthma problems and lung impairment. It enhances air quality by removing harmful chemicals like formaldehyde. Dracaena Dracaena purifies the air and reduces respiratory issues. They also help strengthen the immune system and provide fresh oxygen. Information credits This information is taken from the trusted research website ResearchGate. Plants like tulsi, aloevera, and neem can aid in respiratory diseases. Conclusion These are a few plants that can improve your respiratory health. However, it is advisable to consult a doctor for any lung problems. Read More
